Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I fix the WiFi button or prevent WiFi errors when turning it off and back on?  After I turn on my phone (a Samsung Galaxy I551) the wifi works great. I found a lot in some forums but I couldn't really get any solution.It is really annoying because I generally don't turn off my phone so now I have to reboot it frequently.I can't relate this with the opening of some app or something like that :(Thanks for any help!Diego
